mapper.select: select code, name, purchase_rate, redemption_rate, charge_mode, dividend_mode, belong_to, risk, valid, amount, start_time, inter, week_aip, date_aip from funds where valid=#{valid} order by risk, belong_to;
select code, name, purchase_rate, redemption_rate, charge_mode, dividend_mode, belong_to, risk, valid, amount, start_time, inter, week_aip, date_aip from funds order by risk;
mapper.insert: insert into funds(code, name, purchase_rate, redemption_rate, amount, inter, start_time, charge_mode, dividend_mode, belong_to, risk, valid, week_aip, date_aip) values (#{code},#{name},#{purchaseRate},#{redemptionRate},#{amount},#{interval},#{startTime},#{chargeMode},#{dividendMode},#{belongTo},#{risk, typeHandler=com.springapp.mvc.Controller.EnumStatusHandler},#{valid},#{week},#{date})

update funds set name=#{name}, purchase_rate=#{purchaseRate}, redemption_rate=#{redemptionRate}, amount=#{amount}, inter=#{interval}, start_time=#{startTime}, week_aip=#{week}, date_aip=#{date}, valid=#{valid},charge_mode=#{chargeMode},dividend_mode=#{dividendMode}, risk=#{risk, typeHandler=com.springapp.mvc.Controller.EnumStatusHandler} where code=#{code} and belong_to=#{belongTo};
update funds set start_time=#{startTime} where code=#{code} and belong_to=#{belongTo};
